comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Probably should be H.N. Hempstead. See NYT article at query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9800EEDE103CE633A... HEMPSTEAD AT HELM.; Vice President Will Represent Giants at National League Meeting. December 4, 1912, Wednesday INDIANAPOLIS, Ind., Dec. 3. -- H.N. Hempstead, son-in-law of the late John T. Brush, President of the New York National League Baseball Club, will depart Saturday for New York, where next week he will represent the team at the annual meeting of the league.
